title: How do you report phishing?
body: The title is self-explanatory; Say someone on my friends list send me a phising URL, how do I report it to Rito? The support tickets page doesn't have a phishing/player interaction/chat or anything in that regard as a category, and there's no report button on the chat box.

replies.body:
Firstly, as I'm sure you already know, **don't click on that link**. 

Sorry, needed to get that out of my system xD! With that being said, if you're able to get any screenshots of who was sending you the links send those our way in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). We can look over the site, as well as the player who sent it to you, and see what needs to be done!
I got the don't click part xD. What ticket category do I select though?
